meanings.definition: Not divided into separate branches or paths.
meanings.sent1: The straight road was unforked, leading directly to the town.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed unforked through the valley, without splitting into smaller streams.
meanings.sent3: The unforked tree stood proudly in the middle of the field, looking quite unique.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to take the unforked path in life led to a successful career.
meanings.sent5: The unforked lightning bolt struck the ground with a loud crack.

meanings.definition: Not having a forked shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The unforked branch extended straight out from the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The unforked antenna on the radio provided a clear signal.
meanings.sent3: The unforked pretzel looked odd among the twisted ones in the bag.
meanings.sent4: Her unforked hair fell in a smooth cascade down her back.
meanings.sent5: The unforked road sign pointed travelers in the right direction.
